column4: a marriage ceremony between a Chinese and Khmer couple was raided by the police force of ------Kien Svay------ district for not having the correct permission.------The wedding was halted at 11:30 am on December 2
column8: a 30-year-old Chinese national was attempting to tie the knot with bride
column11: from the village.------According to a report by the local police chief of Kien Svay
column13: the district authorities had not issued any permission for the happy couple to hold the ceremony
column14: as is required by law.------The source said that after receiving this information
column15: police went to work to stop the wedding immediately.  After crashing the party and ruining the bride’s big day
column16: authorities then settled the case according to legal procedures.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/743894.html------
